class biosim.landscape.Landscape[source]¶

This class instantiates a landscape

Creates the variables associated with the class

abundance_fodder_c¶

Abundance of fodder, in the landscape, for carnivores

Returns:float
abundance_fodder_h¶

Abundance of fodder, in the landscape, for herbivores

Returns:float
aging()[source]¶

Age all animals in landscape with one cycle

death()[source]¶

Removes dying animals

eat_request_carn()[source]¶

Carnivores eat in the landscape, in order of fitness The least fit Herbivore gets eaten first

eat_request_herb()[source]¶

Herbivores eat in the landscape, in order of fitness The fittest eats first

fitness_sort()[source]¶

Sorts animals in landscape by their respective fitness

classmethod get_params()[source]¶

Get dictionary of class parameters

Returns:dict
migrate(neighbours)[source]¶

Migrates animals in landscape

Parameters:neighbours – list (valid neighbours)
num_carns¶

Return number of Carnivore in landscape

num_herbs¶

Return number of Herbivore in landscape

populate_cell(population=None)[source]¶

Populates the cell with respective animals

Parameters:population – dict
propensity(animal, epsilon)[source]¶

Calculates the animal’s propensity to migrate

Parameters:
  • animal – object
  • epsilon – float (abundance of food)
Returns:

float (moving propensity)
regenerate()[source]¶

Regenerates fodder in the landscape, if possible

reproduction()[source]¶

For each Animal reproducing, adds one newborn

sum_herb_mass¶

Return the sum of Herbivore weights in the landscape

update_fitness()[source]¶

Updates fitness for all animals

Updates the weight of all animals, following a cycle weightloss
